references.paper_title: Approximating the Shapley Value Using Stratified Empirical Bernstein Sampling
references.reason: This paper is cited for proposing a stratified sampling technique to reduce the variance in Shapley value estimation.

references.paper_title: Improving Polynomial Estimation of the Shapley Value by Stratified Random Sampling with Optimum Allocation
references.reason: This paper is referenced for its proposal of a stratified random sampling technique to improve the accuracy of Shapley value estimation.

references.paper_title: Improving KernelSHAP: Practical Shapley Value Estimation Using Linear Regression
references.reason: This paper is cited for proposing improvements to the KernelSHAP method, a popular approach for approximating Shapley values.

references.paper_title: Beta Shapley: a Unified and Noise-reduced Data Valuation Framework for Machine Learning
references.reason: This paper introduced Beta Shapley values, a generalization of Shapley values that addresses limitations of existing methods.

references.paper_title: Faster Approximation of Probabilistic and Distributional Values via Least Squares
references.reason: This paper is cited for its development of a fast algorithm for approximating probabilistic values, including Shapley and Banzhaf values.
